methods.name: getFunctionTag
methods.comment: Returns the function tag with the given name.

return.comment: the function tag, or null if not found

methods.name: getFunctionTag
methods.comment: Returns the function tag with the given database id.

return.comment: the function tag, or null if not found

methods.name: getAllFunctionTags
methods.comment: Returns all function tags in the database.

methods.name: isTagAssigned
methods.comment: Returns true if the given tag is assigned to a function.

return.comment: true if assigned to a function

methods.name: createFunctionTag
methods.comment:
Creates a new function tag with the given attributes if one does
 not already exist. Otherwise, returns the existing tag.

params.name: comment
params.comment: the comment associated with the tag (optional)

methods.name: setProgram
methods.comment:
Sets the program on this manager to allow the manager to persist changes
 and notify subscribers.

name: FunctionTagManager
comment:
Interface for managing function tags. Tags are simple objects consisting of
 a name and an optional comment, which can be applied to functions in Ghidra.
